name: Saeism
nutshell: In the month since she transferred to a new school, Misao hasn't made any friends. Instead, she's been teased and bullied by some of the more aggressive girls in class. This all changes on the day Sae returns to school. Sae is good at everything, and everyone at school adores her–but Sae seems to want only to be friends with Misao. All the bullying stops immediately, and Misao is thrilled to be best friends with the most popular girl in school. Sadly, things really are too good to be true. Sae starts to become more and more domineering, preventing Misao from making other friends and insisting on controlling how she spends all her time. As Sae's friendship becomes more and more nightmarish, someone reaches out to Misao to try to help her break free. But is it already too late?

name: Urashima
nutshell: A collection of one-shots by Garo mangaka Shinji Nagashima.

name: Gisèle Alain
nutshell:
"Gisèle Alain will provide you with any service, Madame" so she claims as she puts a sign on her door.
Gisèle Alain is the owner of an apartment building and decides to take on whatever request that she receives.
She forces Eric, a resident of the apartment with overdue rent, to tag along with her service.
Their first mission is to find a cat that another resident has lost and claims to have been missing for 3 days.
Upon further investigation, they find a suspicious man taking away cats to an unknown alley.
Gisèle decides to investigate further and finds out who the man is without any trouble.
An amusing yet calm service providing you with anything you want; at your service by Gisèle Alain!

name: Pygmalion
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Romance,Office Workers,Girls' Love,Full Color
nutshell: Chuanchuan Bai, a new intern. Vicky, an executive at the same company. (Translator doesn't know how to make up descriptions). Super gay GL manhua at the workplace. Author Weibo: https://weibo.com/u/1654427497

name: A Story About Dressing Up as a Girl and Playing a Girly game.
Anywhere But Here
nutshell:

Yama e Iku (Going to the Mountains)

Haru no Ogawa

name: 24 Colors ~Hatsukoi no Palette~
nutshell: Nanaka loves to paint. So when she enters high school, she gets excited at the prospect of joining the arts club. However, there are only two members–the mysterious Chihaya and the energetic Kento. They're both good-looking guys, and Chihaya shares Nanaka's love for painting! Alongside the two gorgeous guys (and Nanaka's best friend)… what will happen?

name: Yesterday was like Death
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Drama,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color,Tragedy
nutshell:
Xi ZongHe X Gu Tang
Five years ago Xi ZongHe got into a car crash, and later I saw with my own eyes the whole process of him getting dumped.
Five years later Xi ZongHe got into a car crash again, and not only did he forget that he’s already been dumped, but he even went looking for his ex to reconcile!
I: ”……”
His current boyfriend, me, can feel my balls hurting just watching this.

name: Henkin Tamaider
nutshell: After Henchin Pokoider comes a second even more perverted story on a Dick-powered super here the Henkin Tamaider!

name: Ghost in the Shell 2: Man Machine Interface
nutshell: Takes place a few years after the first Ghost In The Shell manga. The Major has been missing since then, and Ghost in the Shell 2 follows the mysterious Motoko Aramaki as she runs an investigation into an incident at an organ factory and its consequences. She's on the run to clean up the mess and save herself in the process. Meanwhile, the former members of section 9 investigate Motoko to find out who she really is.

name: Arakure Knight: Remember Tomorrow
nutshell: Arakure Knight: Remember Tomorrow is the latest installment in Yoshida's Arakure Knight series. The manga franchise centers around delinquent Haruma Yūki, who seeks to join the motorcycle gang Linda. The manga shows the efforts of Haruma to join the gang, while also following the activities of Linda and its leader Zenba as they clash with rival motorcycle gangs.

name: Intersect
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,Boys' Love,User Created,Drama,Fantasy,Web Comic,Mystery,Full Color

name: Gakuen Heaven Returns
nutshell: One shots collection by various authors

name: Liberty
nutshell: Honjo Maki is a scenario writer for a game company. One night, while going home from work, she almost ran over a girl. By the end of the night, the mysterious girl writes a time and place on Maki's hand. It turns out that it's the venue for the concert of the band Liberty.

name: Holy Idol
nutshell:
Rembrary, the deputy of God loved by all and the holy high priest.
When I woke up while fighting against the Demon King who invaded my world, I woke up as an underrated idol in Korea..!
Will he be able to safely adjust to the idol life and return to his original world?

name: Three Horns!
nutshell:
The gold-headed and hornless gold horns and Gao Leng's unhappy silver horns are twins who love each other (no wonder), adding up to a total of three horn twins.
As the heirs of the family-owned company "Recapture House", the two hope to complete a more difficult commission to gain family recognition.
Well, if the patriarch doesn't agree to dispatch high-level missions … just secretly complete it! The golden horn pulled up the silver horn, and ran on the road of hard work. "Brother must be a fool" vs "Brother is really cold", the story of the growth of the next generation of twins who regained the house has begun!

name: The Two in the Corner
nutshell: A story about the path to maturity, and how that affects two friends. Gakky and Utsumin are always together. What happens when one friend wants to grow up faster than the other?

name: Boku no Ie ni Oide Wedding
nutshell:
From Endless Journey:
Mirei, an 18 years old studying as a specialized student in design, was proposed to by Mano during her high school graduation. Now preparing for her wedding in the summer with a handsome high-class man, this marriage seems like a dream. In reality, these two haven’t even taken their relationship into adulthood yet! How will the naive Mirei handle their newlywed life?

name: The Ex
tags: Time Travel,Long Strip,Romance,Reverse Harem,Drama,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: Love, is a war. An "ugly" girl who was cheated by her boyfriend received a mysterious phone call. Strangely, the other line said that she is 35 years old, and that she is her, from the future! In order to change her, she wants to teach her the law of love. For her to see the beauty in her, take revenge on her ex, and recapture everything she lost before.

name: Shounen Hakaryuudo
nutshell: Ciel is a member of the 'fairy-wing conservation group' - an organization that protects fairies from hunters who try to hunt for them for their wings, which are said to bring the possessor eternal happiness. Ren is a precocious but immature fairy-wing hunter with a tormented past and a grudge to satiate. The encounter between these two will open the doors to a tale interwoven with fate.

name: Evil's Return
nutshell: Yumi, a seemingly average high school girl, is destined to become the wife of and child bearer for Evil. As soon as her first menstrual episodes begin, all sorts of villainous cretins show up in the hopes of providing the seed for wickedness itself. In response, the forces of Good, a Buddhist priest, the Catholic church, and their attendant holy warriors rush to provide protection for the now-pregnable Yumi. But she reaches out to another warrior, a young punk freshman heartthrob who literally beats off the female population of the school with a stick. But when he sees Yumi in a vision, this cool-as-ice thug melts … and the adventure begins …

name: Futari to Hitori no Renai Kouryaku
Sailor Moon - Say (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Story 1: Minako learns that Sailor Moon has awakened, causing mixed feelings.
Story 2: Sailor Pluto meets and befriends a young Princess Serenity.

name: Legend of the Rooftop
nutshell:
Da-Woon vs the Rooftop, rented room survival under extreme circumstances!
A story about a broke college student who is renting a cursed rooftop room!

name: Haroon
nutshell:
(English)
In the distant future, Earth is heavily affected by consecutive nuclear wars and humans are barely surviving under a shield protecting their few “Unions.”
Inside the Unions, people are classified from S to F based on their abilities/aptitudes and live in residential zones that match their classification.
Our protagonist Jung Min was born as one of the 300,000 artificially inseminated children created to prepare for the future of mankind.
However, it turned out that he was aptitude-less (i.e. incompetent) and was thus pushed out to the F Zone, the most dangerous and outermost part of the Union.
Then everything changes on his first day of Adulthood: Jung-min receives an advanced Virtual Reality capsule from his foster father for a game called ‘Beyond.’
(PT-BR)
Em um futuro distante, a Terra é fortemente afetada por guerras nucleares consecutivas e os humanos apenas sobrevivem sob uma barreira que protege suas poucas “Uniões”. Dentro das Uniões, as pessoas são classificadas de S a F com base em suas habilidades e vivem em zonas residenciais que correspondem à sua classificação.
Nosso protagonista Jung Min nasceu como uma das 300 mil crianças artificialmente inseminadas criadas para se preparar para o futuro da humanidade. No entanto, descobriu-se que ele não tinha a menor aptidão (ou seja, incompetente) e foi assim empurrado para a Zona F, a parte mais perigosa e mais distante da União.
Então, tudo mudou no primeiro dia de maioridade: Jung-min recebeu uma cápsula avançada de Realidade Virtual do seu pai adotivo para um jogo chamado “Além”.

name: Sono Hanabira ni Kuchizuke wo - Valentine's Edition (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Mai x Reo

name: Dragon Ball - Yardrats, The Story of a Survivor
nutshell:
Chibi Dam'z's remastered version of his original telling of Son Goku's lost year on Planet Yardrat.
This story explores the author's interpretation of how Goku learned Instant Transmission, as well as being stricken with his heart disease.
This story follows Future Trunks' timeline, although, that won't be apparent until much later.
Author's websites:
http://chibidamz.wordpress.com
https://discordapp.com/invite/aTSA8RC
